item.description: Library There is little more relaxing than curling up in a comfortable chair and reading a great book. Here is a breif list of books that I am currently reading and my favorites of all time. Books I’m reading now Favorite books of all time

Photography Between studying abroad in Australia/New Zeland and a once-in-a-lifetime safari in Tanzania, I have had some amazing opportunities to capture photographs. Woodworking I have been working with wood since I was a kid, but recently I dove head first into fine woodworking and furnituremaking. I particularly enjoy building shaker-style and shaker-influlenced furniture. The design philosophy of “form follows function” resonates with me. I discovered Fine Woodworking Magazine at my local library and started ingesting the information one issue at a time. I discovered that by reading so much about how to build fine furniture, that I skipped right over the not-so-fine furniture that many people start with.
